tobj.errors¶

TinyObj’s Custom Errors

Exceptions¶

TinyObjError

Base error class for TinyObj.

LexerError

Lexer-specific errors, raised during the tokenization phase.

ParserError

Parser-specific errors, raised during the syntax analysis (AST construction) phase.

InterpreterError

Interpreter-specific errors, raised during the runtime execution phase.

Classes¶

Position

Tracks position in source code.

Functions¶

string_with_arrows(text, pos_start, pos_end)

Generates a string representation of the source code snippet

Module Contents¶

class tobj.errors.Position(idx: int, ln: int, col: int, filename: str, text: str)[source]¶

Tracks position in source code.

Parameters:

  • idx (int) – Current index in the source text.

  • ln (int) – Current line number (1-indexed).

  • col (int) – Current column number (1-indexed).

  • filename (str) – Name of the source file.

  • text (str) – The full source text.

idx: int[source]¶
ln: int[source]¶
col: int[source]¶
filename: str[source]¶
text: str[source]¶
advance(current_char: str | None = None) → Position[source]¶

Move position forward one character.

Updates the index, column, and line based on the current character.

Parameters:

current_char (Optional[str]) – The character being advanced over.

Returns:

The updated Position object (self).

Return type:

Position

copy() → Position[source]¶

Creates a deep copy of the current Position object.

Returns:

A new Position object with the same state.

Return type:

Position

tobj.errors.string_with_arrows(text, pos_start, pos_end)[source]¶

Generates a string representation of the source code snippet highlighting the error range with carets (^).

Parameters:

  • text (str) – The full source code text.

  • pos_start (Position) – The starting position of the error.

  • pos_end (Position) – The ending position of the error.

Returns:

The highlighted source code snippet.

Return type:

str

exception tobj.errors.TinyObjError(pos_start: Position, pos_end: Position, error_name: str, details: str)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Base error class for TinyObj.

All custom errors in the TinyObj language should inherit from this class.

Parameters:

  • pos_start (Position) – Starting position of the error in source code.

  • pos_end (Position) – Ending position of the error in source code.

  • error_name (str) – The name of the error (e.g., “LexerError”).

  • details (str) – Specific details about the error.

pos_start: Position[source]¶
pos_end: Position[source]¶
error_name: str[source]¶
details: str[source]¶
__str__() → str[source]¶

Generates a user-friendly string representation of the error, including the error type, details, file, line number, and a highlighted snippet of the source code.

Returns:

The formatted error message.

Return type:

str

exception tobj.errors.LexerError(pos_start: Position, pos_end: Position, details: str)[source]¶

Bases: TinyObjError

Lexer-specific errors, raised during the tokenization phase.

Parameters:

  • pos_start (Position) – Starting position of the error.

  • pos_end (Position) – Ending position of the error.

  • details (str) – Specific details about the lexing error.

exception tobj.errors.ParserError(pos_start: Position, pos_end: Position, details: str)[source]¶

Bases: TinyObjError

Parser-specific errors, raised during the syntax analysis (AST construction) phase.

Parameters:

  • pos_start (Position) – Starting position of the error.

  • pos_end (Position) – Ending position of the error.

  • details (str) – Specific details about the parsing error.

exception tobj.errors.InterpreterError(pos_start: Position, pos_end: Position, details: str)[source]¶

Bases: TinyObjError

Interpreter-specific errors, raised during the runtime execution phase.

Parameters:

  • pos_start (Position) – Starting position of the error.

  • pos_end (Position) – Ending position of the error.

  • details (str) – Specific details about the runtime error.
